# Examples of Plotly

## Scatterplot
 
Install Instacart Data
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(p8105.datasets)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
data("instacart")
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
instacart =
  instacart %>% 
  plot_ly(x = ~product_name, y = ~order_number, type = "scatter", mode = "markers")
```
